mapper.select: /**ieda.iaas.common.commonIaas.selectdefaultIaasAccountInfo**/ Select id as id ,iaas_type as iaasType ,account_name as accountName ,common_access_endpoint as commonAccessEndpoint ,common_access_user as commonAccessUser ,common_access_secret as commonAccessSecret ,openstack_keystone_version as openstackKeystoneVersion ,common_tenant as commonTenant ,common_project as commonProject ,openstack_domain as openstackDomain ,azure_subscription_id as azureSubscriptionId ,default_yn as defaultYn ,create_user_id as createUserId ,update_user_id as updateUserId ,create_date as createDate From ieda_iaas_account where default_Yn = #{defaultYn} AND UPPER(iaas_type)=UPPER(#{iaasType})

/**ieda.iaas.common.commonIaas.selectParentCodeAndSubGroupCode**/ Select parent_code as parentCode, sub_group_code as subGroupCode, code_description as codeDescription, code_name as codeName, code_name_kr as codeNameKr, code_value as codeValue From ieda_common_code Where parent_code = #{parentCode} And code_value not in ('33000','34000');

/**ieda.iaas.common.commonIaas.selectIngressRulesInfoBySubGroupCode**/ Select code_name as codeName ,code_value as codeValue ,code_name_kr as codeNameKr ,code_description as codeDescription ,sub_group_code as subGroupCode ,usub_group_code as usubGroupCode ,parent_code as parentCode From ieda_common_code Where parent_code = #{parentCode} AND code_name_kr like CONCAT('%(',#{codeNameKr},')') AND usub_group_code is null AND sub_group_code = #{subGroupCode}
